name: defiant
effect: When any of this Pokémon's stats are lowered, its Attack rises by two stages. If multiple stats are lowered at once, this ability takes effect with each stat lowered.
short_effect: Raises Attack two stages upon having any stat lowered.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: If the Pokémon has any stat lowered by an opposing Pokémon, its Attack stat will be boosted sharply.
